snippet: Venus Williams, battling an autoimmune disease, and her sister Serena, the singles winner, defeated the Czech players Andrea Hlavackova and Lucie Hradecka, each equaling Decugis’s total a century ago of four tennis gold medals.
abstract: Venus Williams, battling an autoimmune disease, and her sister Serena, the singles winner, defeated the Czech players Andrea Hlavackova and Lucie Hradecka, each equaling Decugis’s total a century ago of four tennis gold medals.

headline.main: Move Over, Max Decugis: Williamses Win Doubles
